title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 554.8 - Applicability to other operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 554.8 - Applicability to other operations

State Regulations

In addition to being applicable to newly drilled wells, the
applicable provisions of all of the foregoing sections of this Part shall be in
effect for all deepening, plug back and conversion operations except for
deepening or plug back operations to be conducted exclusively within the
producing horizon of a pool and for which no application for permit under
section
552.1
of this Title shall have been
required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
554.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
